title: UFC 314 LIVE: Results and Analysis for Volkanovski vs. Lopes
description: Brett Okamoto, Andreas Hale and Jeff Wagenheim break down all the action of UFC 314 in Miami.
author: ESPN Staff

title: Rory seizes Masters lead, but Bryson just 2 back
description: Rory McIlroy will take a two-shot lead into the final round of the Masters, with Bryson DeChambeau hot on his heels after a furious finish Saturday.
author: Mark Schlabach

title: McIlroy leads Masters by two as he chases Grand Slam
description: Rory McIlroy holds a two-shot lead over Bryson DeChambeau heading into Sunday's final round of the Masters.

title: Newcastle boss Howe taken to hospital
description: Eddie Howe "is conscious and talking with his family" but will miss Newcastle's Premier League fixture with Manchester United on Sunday.

title: Piastri takes Bahrain pole with Norris only sixth
description: Oscar Piastri took pole position in a dramatic end to qualifying for the Bahrain Grand Prix as championship leader Lando Norris was only sixth.

title: McIlroy explains psychologist chat ahead of stunning Masters rally
description: Rory McIlroy praised his own major resilience and the support of sports psychologist Bob Rotella after charging back into contention for the career Grand Slam at The Masters.

title: Alabama forward Derrion Reid enters transfer portal
description: Alabama Crimson Tide forward Derrion Reid (35) reacts in the second half against the Robert Morris Colonials during the NCAA Tournament First Round at Rocket Arena. Photo | Ken Blaze-Imagn Images Alabama has lost another player to the transfer portal from its 2024-25 roster, as forward Derrion Reid entered the portal Friday night.

title: Packer softball team splits with Red Wing
description: Apr. 12â€”The Austin softball team split a doubleheader with Red Wing as the Packers took the first game 8-6 before dropping the nightcap 5-2 in Todd Park Saturday. Austin head coach Lisa Lage was pleased with the play of her team. "While we wanted to win both, it was a great experience to see what it takes to play two games back to back, like we will have to do in the section tournament," Lage ...
